room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Fears" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: This was an absolute blast! My family (there were 6 of us) did the Escape Your Fears Room tonight, which is the hardest room. So glad that we chose to do this one! We had a great time and worked really well together. We were allowed to finish and we only went 3 minutes over the time limit. We will definitely be back to do other rooms! Thanks for an amazing experience!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Fears" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: We have experienced 4 escape rooms and by far this was our favorite. We did the Escape Your Fears room and it was an exciting hour of our lives. We had an adrenaline rush for 24 hours after. We have teens so this was a good thing to do as a family. Worth doing. We will be back to check out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Fears" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: Have been to a wide range of escape rooms across New England and nothing compares! Our group did "Escape Your Fears" and it has been by far the best escape room we have done to date! Can't wait to return to the area and try one of their other rooms!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Fears" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: The Escape your Fears room is one of my favorites that I have done so far. A great challenge and my group finished it with only seconds to spare! Such a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Your Fears" by Maine Escape Games in South Portland
review: We did all 3 rooms at Maine Escape Games and we enjoyed them all. Each room was well-designed with numerous challenging puzzles. The "Escape Your Fears" room was one of my favorite rooms ever. This is an excellent location for both experienced players or beginners. We are very much looking forward to returning when their new rooms open!
